DataElement.preferredName: Mastectomy Complication Prior To Radiation Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator to identify if any mastectomy complications occurred prior to radiation therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Mastectomy Complication Prior To Radiation Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Surgical removal of the breast._Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
